Related Character(s): 櫄, 杻, 橁
Связанный символ (и): 櫄, 杻, 橁

杶字的基本解释

杶
chūn
古同“椿”，香椿。

杶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chūn］
［《廣韻》丑倫切，平諄，徹。］
即櫄。木名。香椿。

杶字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杶； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页513第18
【唐韻】丑倫切【集韻】【韻會】敕倫切【正韻】樞倫切，?音椿。【說文】木也。【書·禹貢】杶幹栝柏。【孔傳】木似㯉漆。或作橁。【左傳·襄十八年】孟莊子斬其橁，以爲公琴。【註】橁，杶也，琴材。【類篇】?櫄橁?同杶。又槆。

考證：〔【左傳·襄十七年】孟莊子斬其橁，以爲公琴。〕　謹照原文十七年改十八年。
杶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
杶字的起名意思

暂无。

杶
chūn
The ancient same "chun", toon.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chūn］
["Guangyun" is ugly and cut, flat and thorough. ]
That is. Wooden name. Toon.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杶; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 513 18
[Tang Yun] Ugly Lun cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Chi Lun cut [Zheng Yun] Shu Lun cut,? Yin Chun. [Said the text] Mu Ye. 【Book·Yugong】Dry Cypress. [Kong Chuan] Wood is like lacquer. Or make a fuss. [Zuo Zhuan·Eighteenth Year of Xiang] Meng Zhuangzi cut his scorpion and thought it was Gongqin. [Note] Chao, Jian Ye, piano material. 【Classes】? 櫄橁? The same. Again. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Xiangsi Seventeenth Year] Meng Zhuangzi cut his arms and thought it was Gongqin. 〕 　 I would like to change the original seventeen years to eighteen years.
